subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /ghost_ghostsevps/ghost,clipiclean.aiff 
  Uploaded by : ghost_ghosts <ghost_ghosts@...> 
  Description : Private house in coram ny.Im talking about cleaning the basement and a ghost says I clean,then i clean , again toward the end of clip. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/ghost_ghostsevps/ghost%2Cclipiclean.aiff 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

ghost_ghosts <ghost_ghosts@...>
